New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. clinched the batting title with a.332 average
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals ended the season on a high note with a win over the Braves
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals clinched the No. 5 seed in the American League and a matchup with the No. 4-seed Orioles in the Wild Card Series
Others: The Royals ended the ‘24 season with 86 wins, a 30-win improvement from ‘23, and went from 106 losses last year to the postseason this year
